bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of pain at one location pulling on a different location, or radiating into a third location. Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 4 ：胸痹之病，令人心中堅痞忽痛，肌中苦痹。絞急如刺， 不得俯仰，其胸前皮皆痛，不得手犯，胸滿短氣，咳嗽引痛，煩悶自汗 出，或徹引背膂，不即治之，數日害人 , “The disease of chest blockage causes a person to have a hard obstacle-illness in the heart accompanied by sudden pain, and suffering from a blockage in the sinews. There is a twisting pain as if pierced, with an inability to bend or lift the body. The skin on the chest is painful all over, and does not allow one’s hand to touch it. There is a feeling of fullness in the chest, with a shortness of qi. [Patients] cough with a pulling pain . They experience vexation, heart-pressure and spontaneous sweating. In some cases the entire backbone is affected. If this is not cured immediately, after several days it will cause harm to that person”.
